name: Women of Xal: Official Timeline Demo
name_original: Women of Xal: Official Timeline Demo
description:
Women of Xal (WoX) is an upcoming, Kickstarter-funded visual novel from ProjectTrinity Studios. You follow a young woman named Xjena as she begins her climb up the dangerous political ladder against other women eying the same, powerful position of Matriarch.  This demo covers part of her first day at Xuna's estate; the woman she needs to impress in order to win her title as Matriarch of Xanasca.

One of the paths you can take in the demo.

Official Features For the Official Timeline Demo 1.0:

  • Uses Ren’Py
  • Three Endings
  • Dynamic music
  • CGs by Ithaqua Labs Geckos
  • New Characters, New Art, New Music
  • New Romance Option
